DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate vaccine immunogenicity and how well the body tolerates V504 when given with Gardasil.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Tolerability and Immunogenicity of V504 Administered Concomitantly With GARDASIL (V504-001)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Females between 16 to 26yearsold Has never had Pap testing or has only had normal Pap test results. Lifetime history of 0 to 4 sexual partners History of an abnormal cervical biopsy result History of a positive test for HPV; History of external genital/vaginal warts Currently a user of illegal drugs or an alcohol abuser History of severe allergic reaction that required medical attention Are pregnant Received a marketed HPV vaccine Currently enrolled in a clinical trial Currently has or has a history of certain medical conditions or is currently taking or has taken certain medications (details will be discussed at the time of consent)
